Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description:
If passed, should be a valid value.
Valid Values: SUSPEND, RESUME, or SHUTDOWN.

Attribute.Name: Async
Attribute.Description: Whether to perform the operation asynchronously. If set to Y, the API will return after sending the request to the server being modified. If set to N [default], the API will only return when the request has been fully processed by the server. At this time, this attribute only takes effect when the Action is SHUTDOWN.

Attribute.Name: Id
Attribute.Description: Identifies the server being modified. The server Id is generated by the system.

Attribute.Name: NoOfThreads
Attribute.Description: No Of Threads dedicated for the service.
